name: 陳文章
objective: 本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
schedule:
1.流體流經沉浸物體(Flow Past Immersed Objects)
2.流體輸送與計量(Transportation and Metering of Fluids)
3.動量輸送原理(Fundamentals of Momentum Transfer)
4.熱傳導(Heat Transfer by Conduction)
5.熱流原理(Principles of Heat Flow in Fluids)
6.無相變化熱對流(Heat Transfer to Fluids Without Phase Change)
7.相變化熱對流沸騰與凝結(Heat Transfer to Fluids With Phase Change)
materials:
1. McCabe, W. L., Smith, J. C. & Harriott, P., “Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering”, 7th edition, 2005, 東華書局
2. 林俊一，輸送現象，2004，全威圖書公司
